articles.author: Annie Palmer
articles.title: Amazon CEO of Worldwide Consumer Dave Clark resigns - CNBC
articles.description: Amazon's top retail boss is stepping down effective July 1, the company announced in a securities filing on Friday.
articles.content:
Dave Clark, CEO of Amazon's worldwide consumer business and a top lieutenant of CEO Andy Jassy, will resign July 1 after 23 years at the company, Amazon announced in a regulatory filing Friday.
